page.title: 09Fiona's Story Continued
page.content: going to visit a farm called "Sunnyside". We were met by the farmer, Mr Allen, who was kind enough to answer all our questions. On the farm we saw cows, chickens and pigs who would not come out of their sty. We were able to stroke the cows and one of them licked my hand. It's tongue was very rough! Back at school it was time for dinner which was roast beef,roast potatoes, cabbage and carrots. Back in class at 13.15 we did some reading and then we went to the hall for Country Dancing followed by BAGA practice for the May Fete. When school ended I went home, got my bike and rode to Mrs Diver's house were my mother was. I played with my friend Louise until it was tea time. Half-an- hour piano lesson followed and then I watched TV until 20.00 when I washed and went to bed.
